Question: Amaryllo Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Amaryllo Inc.

myHPcloud One-Time Payment Cloud Storage

- Offers a one-time-payment pricing model for cloud storage, relieving users from monthly or annual commitments
- Allows users to gradually expand their storage as their needs grow
- Introduces a feature to share storage among 10 users, each with their own personal cloud space
- AI features assist in organizing digital files, organizing photos and videos into smart albums
- Available for purchase in Japan, Taiwan, Malaysia, Singapore, New Zealand, Australia, and South Korea as of January 2024
